participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, she seeks joy in discovering new things and cherishes moments spent in nature.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things. To free my mind from feeling depressed, I look up at the stars at night. I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection. I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove. I lay awake at night so I can watch the stars.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and sociable, he enjoys creating connections with others while indulging in comfort foods.
participant_2.background: I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie. I volunteer in my son’s boy scout troop. I live close to the coast. My number is 42. I’m the general manager of the local grocery store.

content.text: I love spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
What kind of things do you collect?
I collect a lot of things. I like to collect star charts and books about astronomy. I also like to collect seashells and rocks.
Cool! I love astronomy too. I like to watch the stars at night.
Me too! I love to lay awake at night and watch the stars. It's so peaceful.
I love it too. It's so calming.
I also like to go camping and stargaze.
Me too! I love going camping. It's so much fun to go out in nature and relax.
I agree! I love being outdoors.
I think we would get along very well.
I agree! We should hang out sometime.
I'll let you know when I'm free.
